body:
Ok, I did this with my Mum and it totally worked, she freaked out! xD

What you do is:

1) Carefully take the lid of you toilet off.

2) Take some food colouring.

3) Put about 5 drops in.

4) Put the lid back on.

5) Wait until someone goes to the toilet :D

I hope it works with you guys!
